descriptions.todo: A todo app with features like filtering, notifications, strong validation, and more.
descriptions.weatherApp: A simple weather app showing the searched city's current weather status.

about.title: About Me
about.main: I am a passionate frontend developer.
about.text: As a self-taught programmer, I learned coding via online resources, youtube and surfing the net. I learned English on my own too. I love solving problems and creating efficient solutions for every challenge. My goal is to continuously grow, innovate, and contribute to the tech industry.

values.frontend: about 4 years of experience specializing in React.js, Next.js, and Angular.
values.projects: Weather App (React.js), Real Estate Website (React.js), Rich-Featured To-Do App (Next.js, TypeScript).
values.workExperience: Remote frontend developer at Dayan and Pishtazteb(Tehran) and various other  projects.
values.skills: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Next.js, React.js, Angular, Tailwind CSS, API integration, UI/UX development.
values.softSkills: Problem-solving, self-learning, adaptability, teamwork, attention to detail.

text.service1: Developing modern, fast, and scalable web applications with React.js, Next.js, and Angular.
text.service2: Building responsive, user-friendly, and optimized UI/UX experiences.
text.service3: Integrating APIs, handling state management, and optimizing performance.
text.service4: Code refactoring, debugging, and improving existing applications.
text.service5: Providing consultation and solutions for frontend challenges.
